LanguageData.StealthBoy.label: StealthBoy
LanguageData.StealthBoy.description: This is the personal cloaking device of the RobCo Stealth Boy Model 3001. Designed by Robert Mayflower, the Stealth Boy generates a modulation field that transfers reflected light from one side of an object to the other, making the wearer virtually invisible to the untrained eye.
LanguageData.MisterHandyKit.label: Mister Handy Kit Helper
LanguageData.MisterHandyKit.description: Instructions and kit for assembling Mister Handy
